Translations.Text: Nnan d imvebboen imzuxiyen, n ugdud is,: "a k nessuffe$ a Cuaayeb, kecc, akked wid iumnen yidek, si temdint nne$, ne$ a d tu$alev ar ddin nne$". Inna: "xas nugi

Ihi, nger ed tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ma nu$al ar ddin nnwen, mbaad ma Isellek a$ Oebbi, segs. Ur a$ ilaq ara a nu$al $uoes, siwa ma Irad Oebbi, Mass nne$. Mass nne$ Issemealleq i yal cci s tmusni. Nepkel $ef Oebbi". A Mass nne$! Fru p garane$ akked ugdud nne$, s tidep. Kecc Tifev akw wid iferrun
Nnan imvebboen, wid ijehlen, n ugdud is: "ma teddam d Cuaayeb, war ccekk a pxesoem
Tewwet iten zzenzla, gwran d, deg ixxamen nnsen, d loeppat
Wid iskaddben Cuaayeb, u$alen amzun ur zdi$en. Wid iskaddben Cuaayeb, d nitni ay d imexuuoen
Iwexxeo asen, u inna: "a yagdud iw! Ni$ ssawve$ awen d tiboatin n Mass iw, neuee$ kwen. Amek ara $weble$ $ef ugdud ijehliyen
Ur Nuzen ara nnbi ar temdint, mebla ma Newwet imezda$ is s cedda, akked lemveooa, amar ad eiwten
Sinna, Nerra ise$ deg umkan n tucmip, armi wexxoen, nnan: "ni$ jeooben imezwura nne$ lemveooa akked ttrika". Newwet iten deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Lemmer kan uminen u eezzben imezda$ n temdinin, war ccekk, ad asen Nelli lbaoakat seg igenni akked tmurt. Maca, skaddben. Nessemealleq asen, ilmend n wayen keppben
Day $ilen imezda$ n temdinin, ur ten id teppawev tiyta nne£, deg yiv, nitni iisen
Ne$ day $ilen imezda$ n temdinin, ur ten id teppawev tiyta nne£, deg wazal, nitni ppuraren
Day $ilen sellken i tandit n Oebbi? Siwa agdud i ixesoen, i i$ilen sellken i tandit n Oebbi
Ne$ day ur d Iban ara, i wid ara iweoten tamurt, deffir imezda$ is, ar, ma ihwa ya£, a ten Newwet $ef ibekkaven nnsen, a Nesle$ ulawen nnsen, d$a nitni ur sellen
D timdinin agi, i$ef ak Neekku, si tequivin nnsent. Ni$ usan $uosent imazanen nnsent, s ubeggen. Ur llint d tid ara iamnen deg wayen skaddbent uqbel. Akka i Iselle$ Oebbi ulawen ijehliyen
Ur Nufi nnesba ar tegwti nnsen. Nufa, tegwti nnsen, d iballa$en
Sinna, deffir sen, Nuzen ed Musa, s issekniyen nne£, ar Feraun akked imvebboen is. Densen ten. Wali amek tevoa d ifessaden
Inna Musa: "a Feraun! Nek d amazan s$uo Mass imavalen
D uuee, ur qqaoe$, $ef Oebbi, siwa tidep. Ih, usi$ kwen id, s ubeggen n Mass nnwen. Ihi, azen yidi At Isoail
Inna: "ma tusiv d s ussekni, zzi t id, ma tessawalav tidep
Iveggeo taakwazt is, appan d azrem n uuee
Issuffe$ ed afus is, iban ed d amellal i imnezhen
Nnan d imvebboen n ugdud n Feraun: "wagi, s tidep, d aseeear amusnaw
Ib$a a kwen issuffe$ si tmurt nnwen, d acu t lameo nnwen
Nnan: "anef as, neppa akked gma s. Azen iberraeen ar temdinin
ad ak d awin yal aseeear amusnaw
Usan d iseeearen n Feraun, nnan: "s tidep, ad a$ tkafiv, ma d nekwni ara i$elben
Inna: "ih, u, s tidep, a ppilim d iqoiben
Nnan: "a Musa! A pveggoev kecc, ne$ a nveggeo nekwni
Inna: "veggoet"! Mi veggoen, sdehcen allen n l$aci, ssagwden ten. Bbwin d sseur anect ilat
